title.rendered: INTECH expands offshore O&M footprint in the Middle East with a long-term contract win for Wellhead Platforms Services

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]INTECH strengthens its position as one of the leading Operations & Maintenance service providers for Oil & Gas in the Middle East with yet another long-term contract win, this time for offshore wellhead platforms services.

INTECH’s proud O&M services history features some of the largest offshore facilities in the world. As signified by the latest contract win, INTECH’s O&M division stands out due to its multi-disciplinary expertise and the backing of one of the largest automation & digitalization focused organizations in the region.

Augmented by INTECH’s Offshore O&M references and decades of experience with wellhead systems in diverse environments, INTECH was the services partner-of-choice for this project. INTECH’s team will provide a diverse range of services on wellhead hydraulic control panels and the associated safety shutdown systems. INTECH’s services will draw from thousands of man years of engineering experience, data, and knowledge for consistently high asset performance and ensuring long asset life. INTECH will also provide professional trainings to the client teams and ensure knowledge-sharing, as and when needed.

About INTECH’s O&M Solutions

INTECH’s O&M services provide long-term asset healthcare, maintenance, and upgrades ensuring sustained operation of assets for their planned life and beyond. Our project experiences help us gain valuable knowledge of systems, improving our learning curve in comparison to a third-party O&M provider, thereby reducing O&M risks & costs. With INTECH’s diverse expertise in control systems and oil & gas applications, we also help reduce the hassle of managing multiple vendors for any O&M situation. A single INTECH resource is skilled at handling multiple systems – saving both finances and time.

For more information visit: https://www.intechww.com/field-services

About INTECH Wellhead Solutions

INTECH’s Wellhead Automation Solutions cover design, manufacturing, installation, commissioning, and operation & maintenance of Wellhead Systems in any location worldwide. Our wellhead products cover generic and custom-built vendor-neutral solutions which range from hydraulic control panels and subsea master control stations to artificial lift optimization solutions, pump-off controllers, wellhead RTUs and injection skids. INTECH’s dedicated panel shops in USA and UAE help deliver UL certified panels in record times without compromising standards and quality.

For more information about INTECH Wellhead Solutions, click here: https://www.intechww.com/skids-packages/

About INTECH

INTECH Automation & Intelligence is a globally renowned industrial automation & digitalization technology company. For nearly 30 years we have helped major oil & gas companies resolve their most pressing issues of instrumentation, control, and electrical automation. INTECH’s diversiﬁed automation solution portfolio, technical skills, knowledge, and expertise on equipment from all major OEMs, and our asset-application speciﬁc approach to solution design are what differentiates us from a typical system integrator.

As part of our promise of helping businesses evolve in the Industry 4.0 era, we have focused on building up our expertise on Industrial IoT and related digitalization solutions. We are gradually shifting from a project-based solution provider to a partnership-based solution provider. We have started working closely with our technology and platform partners as well as clients to build long-term relationships where we work together to solve problems and provide solutions that are cost-efficient, time-efficient, and bring the best of what everyone can offer.

For more information, please visit: www.intechww.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
